website_summaries.verdict: An excellent source of protein that helps medium breed dogs develop and maintain muscle and live active lifestyles. Many owners rave about how much their dogs enjoy the flavor.
pros: Perfectly-sized kibble in a formula designed for medium-sized dogs, as it includes a high amount of protein to keep them active and strong
Also contains antioxidants and is a good source of fiber
Omega fatty acids help improve skin and coat
cons: Contains more by-products and fillers than some other premium brands
Reports of digestive upset or diarrhea

customer_reviews.title: One of the few brands recommended amid this current wave of dog food hysteria.
customer_reviews.text: For those of you following, this is one of the 4 or 5 brands that is currently recommended in light of the ongoing issue about grains and such in many brands leading to health issues. This is relatively inexpensive, but even my extremely picky shiba likes it. I chose to buy from Amazon because their bags of food come in vacuum sealed bags which I LOVE. Super fresh and trustworthy.
customer_reviews.author: pointman

customer_reviews.title: Picky dog seems to like it
customer_reviews.text: Picky dog wouldn’t eat her food. Switched to this and she seems to enjoy it. It makes her potty schedule more regular.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: My dog broke out in a rash, got very gassy and threw up after eating two meals. Hes been on Royal Canin since he was a puppy. I stopped feeding him from this lot BBD/MA/CAD 26 NOV 2021 022D3RLB04 23:17 S17417. Something is wrong with this batch of food.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Burke

customer_reviews.title: Less than what I expected. But OK.
customer_reviews.text: Was trying to save a little $$ but quality of shipping was less than desirable. Missed the time if delivery took 2-3 extra days and when delivered there was a small cut in it...not sure if it effected the freshness but most likely won't do that again.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: This is a great brand, and I have swore by they quality of food. It is a brand that I really recommend! Amazon did a great job of delivering it in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Nandaa Gee

customer_reviews.title: Good vet approved dog food
customer_reviews.text: Good brand recommended by our pets’ vet. Only one flavor so we have to buy other flavors from other vet approved brands to mix it up for our dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Mr&MrsCarCrazy

customer_reviews.title: Weird poops, dog didn’t like it, didn’t work out
customer_reviews.text: Dog didn’t like it and it gave her weird poops for a while
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Healthy dog food!
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to like this and her allergies are better when she’s eating this food!
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Vicinanza

customer_reviews.title: Grand dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My grand fur dog Golden doodle has a sensitive tummy and loves this food
customer_reviews.author: stacey lauseng

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. It was recommended by our vet.
customer_reviews.author: Linda K. Cox

customer_reviews.title: Now it takes me 2 hours in the park to tire her out and shes been in the best shape since we've had her
customer_reviews.text: This food is doggie power food. My 2 year old 50 pound shepherd was finicky with foods, we would have to change the brand every month or she would not eat properly. This one she loves, and there is a huuuge difference in her stamina and health. She was lazy and getting fat. Now it takes me 2 hours in the park to tire her out and shes been in the best shape since we've had her. A bit pricey, but worth every penny. It lasts as long as cheaper brands because she needs a lesser quantity. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Raghav

customer_reviews.title: Dog Approved
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food! Well this and people food, lol
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: My King Charles Cavalier loves this food. What more can I say.
customer_reviews.author: Tashy

customer_reviews.title: This dog food has made my dog terribly sick with excessive bouts of diarrhea over a long ...
customer_reviews.text: This dog food has made my dog terribly sick with excessive bouts of diarrhea over a long period of time (I purchased with subscribe and save). I took dog to vet and they had me test a theory, I purchased the same brand of dog food from a local pet store and it eliminated the diarrhea.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Update:  Worms in the food even after stored in sealed container
customer_reviews.text: dog loves it - recommended by my vet. Tried Fromm and came back to royal canin because my pup would not eat the Fromm.. she is a 14 month old goldendoodle UPDATE: I keep the food in a sealed plastic container... today I found the food in my dogs dish as well as the food in the container crawling with WORMS!!! They had to have hatched in the food in the last day ICK!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Dog loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a rescue that was 1 1/2 to 2 yrs old when I got her. She would gobble up food when it was a new kind but after a while was bored with it. My vet wanted me to not change around. I tried numerous ones including Pro Plan and Hill's Science Diet, among others. once I began buying this one, she gobbles it up every time. I am on my 4th large bag of it. I save money on the Subscribe and Save plan!
customer_reviews.author: Cajun gal

customer_reviews.title: This food keeps your dog smelling sweet!
customer_reviews.text: We have two Whippets, and I go through 1 bag of this a month total. the best thing about this food, besides that the VET recommended it as super-good for our dogs? Any gas they have doesn't stink. Oh my goodness that is so wonderful! And they don't have hardly any gas after eating this product, unlike cheaper brands we have tried. The difference is night and day. Sorry for the graphic description, but we had a serious problem with our dogs. It was embarrassing when guests would come over, before we got them eating this brand. If your dog has stinky gas, this is the food to try!
customer_reviews.author: aos&movingforward

customer_reviews.title: so it took the Vet and I a little while to figure out why they were both throwing up and having horrible diarrhea when all the o
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs got really sick when they were eating this bag of food. They have both been on Royal Canin Medium for years, so it took the Vet and I a little while to figure out why they were both throwing up and having horrible diarrhea when all the other tests came back negative. Once we realized it was traced back to opening this specific bag of food for the dogs, we got a fresh bag of food and sure enough the diarrhea and throwing up vanished within a day or two. I have no idea what was wrong with the bag, but it was a big waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn Burkey

customer_reviews.title: Iffy dog food
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product since my regular carrier was unable to get my dog’s food to me on time. Immediately, after feeding the food to him, he began to face loose poop. I thought it was coincidental but after receiving the food from the usual store, I decided to try and see if his bowl problems continued. It cleared up overnight. It was exactly the same food. I don’t know how the pet food is being stored but I do know I received a sealed bag. I won’t be ordering dog food from amazon again unless I know that I won’t have to worry about it being fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Not on the list of foods suspected to cause heart disease
customer_reviews.text: Changed from Natural Balance Lamb and Rice when that brand came out on the list of dog foods suspected of causing heart disease in dogs. Dog seems to like it ok. The cats keep eating it though which makes them puke. We have had to close off the dog food. We used to free feed all of our animals but lately I can’t find a dog food the cats will leave alone. I put their food up high so the dog can’t get it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dill

customer_reviews.title: High quality. My dogs love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Aussie mix and so far, so good. It's the right size kibble for her; not too big or too small. I've seen an improvement in her coat and she has more energy. Usually she's scratching like crazy this time of year, as she starts to shed her winter coat. Not this year! Also, I notice less shedding overall. Very pleased. I will continue to feed this. I've tried all the brands, high and low price, and this is of excellent quality. Better than Blue, Iams or Diamond, in my opinion. Plus, there's a variety for every dog. Happy I purchased, based on my vets recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: PrissyMissy75

customer_reviews.title: Switched my Airedale to this
customer_reviews.text: I switched my Airedale to this food from a sensitive formula of another brand. We already have the German Shepherd on RC for GSDs. First thing I noticed was she would dig out her old kibble and leave it beside her food bowl but this was all gone. Then noticed her stools were a lot firmer and not as much waste. If her skin and coat clears up then we have a winner.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee Webster

customer_reviews.title: Bag torn and dogs sick, coincidence?
customer_reviews.text: The bag arrived torn. I'm not sure if that is what affected the food, but both of my dogs have been vomiting for a couple of nights. I saw more reviews where their dogs also got sick... I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves this Food
customer_reviews.text: My mini-Australian Shepherd loves this food. He can be a picky eater and sometimes waits until lunch to eat his breakfast but for 3 years, every day he eats 2 cups of this food and never gets stomach problems. We mix one cup of the regular with one cup of the sensitive tummy to keep him regular which helps.
customer_reviews.author: James M. Arrison IV

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Since adopting, my “four-legged nephew”, upon the passing of a very close friend... I was recommended the Royal Canaan brand of medium adult dog food by my veterinarian... I can honestly say, Princey, enjoys his meals very much and I can tell it’s easy on his digestive system 😉....Would highly recommend this to anyone...
customer_reviews.author: Auntie

customer_reviews.title: Great Nutrition
customer_reviews.text: Royal Canin is a top of the line product for your dog. Nutritional quality ingredients and my dog loves it. Will continue to feed my dog this product. You will pay for the higher quality food, but whose dog is not worth the extra cost?
customer_reviews.author: Map

customer_reviews.title: Great go to Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Great go to dog food. My dog seems to like it. I like how the cater to different sizes and ages of dogs. I will say I've ordered 4-5 bags now and twice the zip lock at the top of the bag has given way and broken but I just used a large clip to seal the bag instead of the zip lock.
customer_reviews.author: bart cortright

customer_reviews.title: Thank you
customer_reviews.text: Woohoo the dogs won't eat me in my sleep, lol. They will finally stop wasting away to nothing, (at least that's how they feel)😁. It's the only food these critters will eat.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this brand
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this brand and specific type for over 4 years . So far my two dogs are happy and they have not had any upset belly or complaints .. I always have received my bags fresh and on time .. I would definitely recommend this brand . It’s a little more expensive than other brands , but worth it for my dogs so far
customer_reviews.author: Elena J.

customer_reviews.title: Doggy indulgence
customer_reviews.text: My dogs told me they love, love, love this product. They would eat the entire bag in one sitting if they could. I like the fact that there is no dusty broken kibble at the bottom of the bag like some other highly rated dog foods. My littles eat the mini size adult and labby eats the medium size adult. Although one of my little piggish Chihuahuas will devour the biggie food if he gets a chance.
customer_reviews.author: DogRescue

customer_reviews.title: Did not agree with my dog
customer_reviews.text: My vet recommended this product as I was looking for a new dog food after the FDA released a report saying certain brands (not Royal Canine) caused heart problems... I've heard good things about the brand, but my dog didn't like it. He couldn't keep it down, kept getting the runs (and I'm not talking about exercise), and over a two day period thereafter he just stopped eating. Maybe just me/him, but had to try something else.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price for us.
customer_reviews.text: We used this dog food for a few months because it's what or dog's Foster mom fed her. It wasn't terrible, but it's very expensive, and we recently switched brands because or dog would consistently have softer stools with this food. The new food is less expensive, the dog seems to like it better, and she now has normal, firm stools.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried several brands of dog food and by far this is my favorite. My dogs fur is so much softer / sheds a lot less from eating this and my dog loves the taste. She is 22 pounds and the size of the food was perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Janice

customer_reviews.title: Veterinarian recommended
customer_reviews.text: My dog has grown up eating Royal Canin. Our vet recommended it when she was a puppy. She scarfs down breakfast and dinner each day. All-in-all, we're happy and she's happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best food
customer_reviews.text: This is the best food I have found for my Australian Shepherd and it came well recommended by the veterinarian. He gobbles it up - and could be a bit of a grazer with other foods - keeps him bright eyed and bushy without a tail!
customer_reviews.author: MJT & JLY

customer_reviews.title: Bad bag
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has been eating Royal Canin since she’s been 8 months old. We bought this bag (same as we always do) and my dog has thrown up each time she ate it. Now she won’t even eat it. I’m convinced it’s a “bad” bag. It even looked different.
customer_reviews.author: W. S.

customer_reviews.title: IMHO, dogs should eat raw/homemade diet
customer_reviews.text: All kibble is basically like crappy cereal for dogs. Who knows what's in there?!? If you really care & love your dogs, you should look into feeding a raw or at least homemade diet.
customer_reviews.author: Midori

customer_reviews.title: Mikey likes it, well Franklin.
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be good value and we have not had any problems with shipping or our dog's appetite/stomach so far. Been using Royal Canin for a year since he was a puppy. Healthy and energetic dog.
customer_reviews.author: CKhawkeye

customer_reviews.title: Just Get It Somewhere Else
customer_reviews.text: Nothing against the brand itself. Royal canin is great and my dog enjoys it. My issue came more from shipping. The food was 2 days late and had a cut outside the bag. I think I’m better off order dog food from chewy or going to the store myself.
customer_reviews.author: bluegoober08

customer_reviews.title: Helps my dogs' stomach issue
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs - a Brittany & a Hound/collie - have sensitive stomachs and one is wheat sensitive. This food has helped reduce vomiting and loose stool in the Britt with the wheat issues. My poundpup appears to be a little easier to maintain weight. Granted it's winter but after 3 months I like what I see in both dogs. I also feel better about the lower potential for contamination and recalls with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen in Green

customer_reviews.title: English Setter approved
customer_reviews.text: My very very fussy English Setter seems to eat this more consistently than any of the other 15 brands I've tried. If he eats it I am satisfied. The high quality ingredients in this food also meet my standards as I won't feed him anything with fillers or certain coloring.
customer_reviews.author: booklovr

customer_reviews.title: Pup LOVES IT!
customer_reviews.text: My pup gobbles this down and gets excited every morning when he sees the pouch, like he never has before. He inhales it in two seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Karwyn

customer_reviews.title: Can I return
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this 30 lb bag and the kibbles are way to big for my adult dog because he is an adult but a small dog. I had him on the Royal Canin GI diet and was told by vet I can keep him on the same food just doesn't have to be GI and I had noooo idea that the kibbles would be so big. My dog choked and vomit. Is there a way to return this bag or any idea on how to make kibble smaller. Please help! It said medium so I figured it would be perfect but its definitely too large.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Great Product but mishandled a couple times... ;:0(
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product and priced fairly too. My only complaint is that the last couple times, the large boxed bag has had box cutter holes in the bag which I believe degrades the freshness. Hoping his report will get back to the person(s) responsible for managing quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Burns

customer_reviews.title: My new Go To dog food
customer_reviews.text: My older dogs love it and I have started my English Cocker on the puppy food and she is doing great.

customer_reviews.title: Great Option

customer_reviews.title: My pup loves this food.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible food full of chemicals and no real protein gave dog awful constipation.

She usually has an iron stomach but this cheap-ass food that doesn't even list what kind of protein it contains really did a number on her! I gave it a shot for 3 days then threw out the rest and switched to a food actually made out of food.

customer_reviews.title: arrives on time and is still in date

customer_reviews.title: Our pup hated his food for the first year of his life
customer_reviews.text: Our pup hated his food for the first year of his life. He used to be on the science hill food. We thought maybe he just wasn't a big eater. We used to put cheese on every bowl of food we gave him. Once we got this food, we no longer had to put cheese or anything on it. He gobbles it up!

customer_reviews.title: Our GSP Loves this Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Our dog doesn't have the most sensitive stomach, but we notice when she's been eating other dog food. This seems to be great quality food, our vet recommended it.

customer_reviews.title: Best Brand on the Market, at a reasonable price.

customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this dog food. It was recommended by the breeder and we couldn't be happier. Our dog is 4.5 years old and does not have a weight problem at all. She does not get tons of exercise. We think her weight is attributed to the food.

customer_reviews.text: The only food our dogs come running to. Other foods upset their stomachs differently, but this food is perfect for both.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome food, our dog has an amazing coat from eating this, I'm sure. Awesome value too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have a silky and shiny dog now!
customer_reviews.text: In just a week, I have noticed an ENORMOUS difference in my dog's coat. It has always been soft, but now it is shiny and silky! Before, with her old food, she never really got excited to eat in the morning and some days wouldn't eat more than half a cup out of the 1 1/2 she gets each day. But now... she is SO excited in the morning to eat her food, and she eats it all in one go. I am so very happy with this product, that it is not even funny. Oh, and the bag its in is resealable! +++
customer_reviews.author: trieulove

customer_reviews.text: We’ve been feeding Royal Canine to our dogs for years. We tried other foods throughout that time and alway switch back because they do best on and eat the Royal Canine the best.

product_meta.title: Royal Canin Size Health Nutrition Medium Adult Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description: Size:17-PoundWith countless dog food options out there that feature formulas focused on ingredients, how do you know what nutrition is right for your pet? No matter how big or small your dog is, Royal Canin has a right-sized diet, made with the precise amount of nutrients needed for every stage of their magnificent life. Most medium-sized dogs are known for their seemingly endless energy. Whether their favorite thing is swimming, exploring, or lots of walks, they’re always on the go. These pets need special nutritional support to help keep them running, jumping, and playing all day, every day. Royal Canin Medium Adult dry dog food is a tailored diet made to feed your dog’s high-energy lifestyle. An exclusive mix of antioxidants and prebiotics helps support natural defenses so they can keep on going strong. Omega-3 fatty acids, like EPA and DHA, nourish your dog’s skin and coat health to help them stay vibrant. An optimal balance of highly digestible proteins and fibers helps your dog digest and absorb nutrients. Not only that, the exclusive kibble is highly palatable, and will keep them coming back to their bowl every meal. Add variety to their bowl with Royal Canin Adult wet dog food. And when your dog reaches their later years, there’s Royal Canin Medium Adult 7+ and Medium Aging Adult 10+ dry dog food to help keep them happy and healthy as they age. With nearly 50 years of scientific research and observation, Royal Canin continues to deliver targeted nutrition to feed every pet’s magnificence. Not satisfied? Then neither are we. Our formulas are 100% satisfaction guaranteed. For more details contact us at 800-592-6687.
feature_bullets: Royal Canin Medium Adult dry dog food is precise nutrition specifically made for dogs 1–7 years old weighing 23–55 lbs.
Supports natural defenses for immune support with a blend of antioxidants and prebiotics
Maintains healthy skin and coat health with optimal levels of EPA and DHA
Promotes healthy digestion with easy-to-digest proteins and a balanced supply of fiber
Exclusive kibble design encourages chewing and has a palatability dogs love
